meanings.definition: Make a noise similar to a hiccup, typically due to involuntary contractions of the diaphragm.
meanings.sent1: She was hiccoughing loudly after drinking soda too quickly.
meanings.sent2: The baby started hiccoughing during the car ride.
meanings.sent3: While hiccoughing, he tried to speak, creating a funny sound.
meanings.sent4: The old car engine was hiccoughing like an old man trying to catch his breath.
meanings.sent5: The machine kept hiccoughing, disrupting the peaceful silence of the room.

meanings.sent1: After eating too fast, she began hiccoughing uncontrollably.
meanings.sent2: He always hiccoughs when he laughs too hard.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed surprised by hiccoughing, looking around in confusion.
meanings.sent4: The plan was hiccoughing along, facing unexpected obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The clock on the wall seemed to be hiccoughing, ticking irregularly.
